doc:
Larry Riley (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_Riley_(actor) 0 Larry Riley (June 20, 1953 – June 6, 1992) was an American actor and musician, best known for his role as C.J. Memphis in the film A Soldier's Story (1984) and as Frank Williams in the prime-time TV soap opera Knots Landing. Larry_Riley ( June_20_,_1953 – June_6_,_1992 ) was an_American_actor_and_musician , best_known for his_role as C.J._Memphis in the_film A_Soldier 's_Story ( 1984 ) and as Frank_Williams in the_prime-time_TV_soap_opera_Knots_Landing .
